meta.article_title: December 7, 2015 - Use Simple No-Spin Serves in Doubles

causes_communes: Opponent can choose stronger side to receive
Long serves can be attacked with loops

exercices_complementaires.description: Serve low and flat to make it difficult for opponent to attack. Avoid using spin as it can be used against you.
exercices_complementaires.materiel: Table tennis racket, table tennis balls

erreurs_a_eviter: Serving too high or with spin
